title: Movie Box
desc: MovieBox is a platform for sharing information and video trailers of the latest movies based on the TMDB (The Movie Database) database.

title: Audio Book
desc: I’ve worked on building a seamless and user-friendly platform dedicated to delivering high-quality audiobook experiences. Our website features a robust library of audiobooks, offering users easy access to their favorite titles across various genres.

title: Zayarum Store
desc: Drawing inspiration from Zayarum’s unique and stunning design, I wanted to try recreating it with the goal of enhancing my own knowledge.

title: Sudoku Game
desc: I attempted to create a Sudoku puzzle game with 4 difficulty levels: easy, medium, hard, and very hard. The game stores player information and scores in LocalStorage for a personalized experience. Players can track their progress and compete with their previous scores, making the gameplay more engaging and enjoyable
